data.title: Salvini solitaire of 0.21ct G-H Color in 18kt white gold
data.meta_description: Salvini solitaire in 18kt white gold with a 0.23ct round brilliant cut diamond, set in a classic 4 prong setting. The stone has G-H color and SI1 clarity.
data.text:
Salvini solitaire in 18kt white gold with 0.21ct round brilliant cut diamond, set in a classic 4 prong setting. The stone has G-H color and SI1 clarity. The ring is a size 10 ITA, modifiable on request.

Do you need more photos? Would you like to see the jewel worn?

Send a whatsapp message to 351.9390214

In fulfillment of the duties of fairness and transparency, Gioielleria ReLusso® expressly declares that it DOES does not hold the status of official dealer SALVINI and not to have direct commercial relations with the company that owns the trademark. All the SALVINI jewels on display are purchased from private individuals and refurbished using the exclusive regenerating method LuxuRigen™. In any case ReLusso guarantees the absolute originality and the perfect integrity of the goods marketed and the relative guarantees. The links to the sites of the manufacturers present in this and in the other pages of the site have the exclusive purpose of facilitating the visitors of our site in consulting the products marketed by us in compliance with the law in force, but in relation to which We do NOT quality to authorized dealers. The manufacturers to which the links refer are the exclusive owners of the product brand and licensees of the same. ReLusso is not part of SALVINI official dealers and SALVINI authorized dealers. The List Price of the new indicated on some jewels, corresponds to the “list price to the public” reported on the official website of the maison or on those of their official resellers. It is shown to give an indication of the value of the product, but in some shops the actual price may be lower. All our jewels are sold with the exclusive ReLusso gift box. The original jewelery box is photographed for illustration purposes only and may not be available. For more information please read our FAQ – Frequently asked questions.

Do you want to buy jewelry in installments? With ReLusso it’s easy and convenient!
